titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to prohibit the International Stock Index Investment Fund of the Thrift Savings Fund from investing in any entity in peer or near-peer competitor nations as outlined in the National Defense Strategy, and for other purposes.
Blocking Investment In Our Adversaries Act
Blocking Investment In Our Adversaries Act
Blocking Investment In Our Adversaries Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.
